text: Kraisak Choonhavan (; 8 October 1947 â€“ 11 June 2020) was a Thai politician. He was a member of the Senate for Nakhon Ratchasima Province from 2000 until 2006. He was also Deputy Leader of the Democrat Party from 2008 to 2011. He was born in Bangkok. Choonhavan died of tongue cancer in Bangkok on 11 June 2020, aged 72.Kraisak Choonhavan dies at 72 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from tongue cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Thailand Category:Thai politicians Category:Guitarists Category:People from Bangkok
title: Kraisak Choonhavan
